com.mariangolea.fintracker.banks.csvparser.preferences

Class UserPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mariangolea.fintracker.banks.csvparser.preferences.UserPreferences

  • public class UserPreferences
extends Object
    Container of user preferences:
    User preferred input folder.

    User defined transaction categories, as a map. Category name as key, UserDefinedTransactionGroup as value.

    User defined transaction display names, as a map. Substring of a transaction description as a key, user defined display name as value.
    Author:
    mariangolea@gmail.com

      • setTransactionDisplayName

        public void setTransactionDisplayName(String transactionDesc,
                                      String displayName)
        Set a user defined display name corresponding to a unique sub string found in a transaction description.
        This association is used to automatically group transactions done to the same company, so please be careful to make the first argument as specific as possible.

        A good example is providing simple strings like "LIDL" or "SC NEPTUN SA".

        Avoid using POS identification numbers since these tend to change quite often in Romania.
        Parameters:
        transactionDesc -
        displayName -

      • getDisplayName

        public String getDisplayName(String transactionDesc)
        Get the display name corresponding to received transaction description relevant sub string.
        A good example is providing simple strings like "LIDL" or "SC NEPTUN SA".

        Avoid using POS identification numbers since these tend to change quite often in Romania.
        Parameters:
        transactionDesc - transaction description relevant sub string
        Returns:
        associated display name, may be null

      • addDefinition

        public boolean addDefinition(String categoryName,
                             UserDefinedTransactionGroup newDefinition)
        Add a user defined category name for corresponding transaction group.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - user defined category name
        newDefinition - user defined transaction group.
        Returns:
        true if successful. false if one association already exists (calls updateDefinition instead).

      • removeDefinition

        public boolean removeDefinition(String categoryName)
        Remove the existing definition for a specific user defined category name.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - user defined category name.
        Returns:
        true if successful. false if no such association exists.

      • updateDefinition

        public boolean updateDefinition(String categoryName,
                                UserDefinedTransactionGroup newDefinition)
        Update the existing definition for a specific user defined category name.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - user defined category name.
        newDefinition - user defined transaction group.
        Returns:
        true if successful. false if no previous association existed.
